actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-508, by Ms. Slaughter.

All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived except those arising under clause 9 or 10 or rule XXI. It shall be in order to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Education and Labor.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 177.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 918.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 222 - 191 (Roll no. 2).
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2768) to establish improved mandatory standards to protect miners during emergencies, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 2768 (Supplemental Mine Improvement and New Emergency Response Act of 2007, or the S-MINER Act).

titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2768) to establish improved mandatory standards to protect miners during emergencies, and for other purposes.
